data.name: Hajis
data.detailed_description:
Most terrifying experiment!

Hajis is a survival horror co-op game 1-4 players.
You have to maintain your mentality in an place where any sound can cause your death.

Story

People have been kidnapped because of their intelligence in order to take a competency test for more difficult future missions.
They find themselves in their first test on a strange mission to cleanse an evil spirit that has been trapped in an experiment field belonging to an unknown organization where you will find an underworld creature who can't see you but can hear everything.

You and your friend have to face this creature and defeat it by finishing all the floors objectives.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for people who have fears of lights, loud noises.
